description: Replace generic 'No data' messages with helpful empty states

userStories.title: Add empty state to admin players page
userStories.description: As an admin viewing an empty players list, I want helpful guidance on what to do next.
acceptanceCriteria: When no players exist, show Empty component
Description: 'Get started by adding your first player or importing from CSV'
Action button: 'Add Player' linking to player creation
Type checking passes: npm run check-types

userStories.title: Add empty state to coach dashboard
userStories.description: As a coach with no assigned teams, I want to know why and what to do.
acceptanceCriteria: When no teams assigned, show Empty component
Description: 'You haven't been assigned to any teams yet. Contact your organization admin to get started.'
Type checking passes: npm run check-types

userStories.title: Add empty state to parent children list
userStories.description: As a parent with no linked children, I want guidance on how to link them.
acceptanceCriteria: When no children linked, show Empty component
Description: 'Contact your organization admin to link your children to your account'
Type checking passes: npm run check-types
